title: Self-Regulated Scientific Writing Competency Enhancement Course Based on Mobile Collaborative Writing

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Science writing instruction competency development course for elementary school teachers, requiring a collaborative learning environment via smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can draft science lab reports with 80% accuracy by applying self-regulated writing strategies
Learners can finalize reports incorporating peer feedback three or more times using mobile platform-based collaboration tools
Learners achieve 3.5+ on a 4-point scale in self-regulated writing abilities (goal-setting, monitoring, evaluation) in digital environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
